content.creator:

content.content:
"Carmilla Unbound" Crossover Art Print
Looking for more awesome Vampire Comics? Our friends Clay Adams and D.E. Schrader are live with their own Sexy 1980's Vampire comic: Carmilla Unbound: 1984 - Miami Bites!
We're excited to announce that "The Beast & Snow" is partnering with Clay & D.E. to offer an EXCLUSIVE CROSSOVER ART PRINT to anyone who supports both of our live campaigns!
Get this FREE Crossover Art Print when you support both campaigns!
This art print by Peter Taylor (Lines) & Falk H√§nsel (Colors) sees Vampire Carmilla and Werewolf Belle back-to-back!
Carmilla Unbound: 1984: "More sex! More violence! More vice! The sultry vampiress returns in a taut thriller set to a pulsing, pink & blue, synth soundtrack."
Carmilla Unbound: 1984 - Miami Bites is LIVE!
Backers who support both campaigns at a Physical Pledge Level (meaning you're having some rewards shipped to you in both campaigns) will receive a both Physical copy (included in your Carmilla Unbound rewards package) and a Hi-res Digital copy of the art print.
Backers who support both campaigns at a Digital Pledge Level (or one campaign Physically and the other Digitally) will receive just the Hi-res Digital copy of the art.
This Art Print will only be available via this crossover initiative, so don't miss out!
Support "Carmilla Unbound": https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/schraderopolis/carmilla-unbound-1984-miami-bites?ref=esvjcg

content.title: Dancer/Assassin Crossover Print + Next Stretch Goal
content.creator:
Phil Falco (Lifeline Comics)Collaborator
March 18, 2025
content.content:
Lifeline Comics has just launched a new campaign: The Dancer: A Psychological Martial Arts Graphic Novel -- a trade collects the ENTIRE MINISERIES with an epilogue bonus chapter exclusive to the collected edition.
"A Dancer/ASSASSIN is forced to relive the trauma of witnessing her parents' murder as a child. COLLECTING THE COMPLETE MINISERIES!"
Support "The Dancer" for a FREE CROSSOVER PRINT!
And while we can't share the art with you just yet, we do have a CROSSOVER ART PRINT that we'll be giving FOR FREE to anyone who backers both The Dancer and The Beast & Snow!
What makes this different from other Crossover Prints you'll see from this campaign is that Digital Backers of The Beast & Snow can still get this print!
So long as you back The Dancer Physically (having some rewards shipped to you), you'll get the crossover print as long as you also back The Beast & Snow (regardless of whether this backing is Physical or Digital).
We'll share the art for this print once it's complete, but we'll tease that it features Vampire Snow White biting Dancer/Assassin Mia, and is drawn by MeechDoodle!
Check out "The Dancer" here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/philfalco/dancer-vol-1?ref=ecfnwq
We're super close to unlocking our first Stretch Goal, so we thought it was a good time to announce our second one!

More Kickstarters
To end off, here's another campaign to have on your radar from a friend of ours!
Proctor: Vol. 1 - A 140 Page Supernatural Punk Rock Adventure

"If your favorite demon hunter had an unhealthy relationship with her mother, a slight drinking problem, and a story that challenged conventional ideas of love and loss, then PROCTOR would be the end result. With a diverse cast of characters reflective of the communities and people surrounding contemporary readers, fans of the supernatural action-adventure will appreciate Sam‚Äôs world and the friends she meets on her journey."

content.title: Read a free VAMPIRE Webtoon from the Creators of "The Beast & Snow"!
content.creator:
Kat Calamia (Lifeline Comics)
March 13, 2025
content.content:
NEW WEBTOON: "Love at Second Bite"
We're excited to announce the debut of a brand new Queer Webtoon from the creators of "The Beast & Snow"! This webcomic is premiering as an entry in Webtoon's "Webcomic Legends 2025" Contest, and we're asking for YOUR help to win the contest!
"Love at Second Bite" is a Vampire Boy Love series that sees cheerful and sunny vampire, Liam, start college at Hemlock University and develop a crush on his mysterious and gloomy roommate, Dean.
Fans of "The Beast & Snow" are sure to enjoy the sharp characters, sleek art, and steamy beats of LASB, and can even expect to see some pretty important Girl Love elements as the series progresses!
One of the criteria used to judge entrants in the "Webcomic Legends" Contest is Audience Participation. So any help you can give by Reading, Liking, Commenting, Subscribing, and Rating "LASB" will be VERY appreciated!
Check out "Love at Second Bite" here: https://www.webtoons.com/en/canvas/love-at-second-bite-bl/list?title_no=1032775
All backers get the Indie Comic Book Bundle just for supporting this campaign for $1 or more. And we'll add even more digital comics to the Indie Bundle as we hit certain Backer Milestone Goals!

content.title: Funded + First Stretch/Backer Goals
content.creator:
Phil Falco (Lifeline Comics)Collaborator
March 10, 2025
content.content:
FUNDED!
The Beast & Snow #1-3 has officially hit its funding goal!
Thank you, as always, for coming out to support out campaign in its first week! The early days of a campaign are the most critical to its success, so we're unendingly grateful to have readers who are so ready to jump on the new campaign right away!
We're SUPER EXCITED to share this new issue with you! It might be our favorite so far in the series (and it is artist Dorilys's favorite issue).
With funding out of the way, let's set our sights on some Stretch Goals!
üîí $40K - Indie Bundle Expansion Pass (LOCKED üîí)
All backers get the Indie Comic Book Bundle just for supporting this campaign for $1 or more. It's a collection of digital comics generously donated by the Indie community. And if this Stretch Goal is unlocked, we'll add another 4 books to the bundle!
Includes: Tercona #1, Ghost of the Monastery, Oh My Ghost #1, and Ms Johnni #1
If the Expansion Pass isn't enough for you, we'll add even more digital comics to the Indie Bundle as we hit certain Backer Milestone Goals!
üîí 950 Backers  - Werewolf Frankenstein #1 (LOCKED üîí)
Every campaign, we host an Early Bird Giveaway for backers who support our projects within their first 48 hours. It's our way of saying thank you for supporting the Kickstarter during its most critical time.
This time, we're giving away the EXXXOTICA Exclusive Witches of Oz #1 variant cover featuring art by Xongbros.
Congrats to the winner of this giveaway: Backer #125 Matteo!
